description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Jose Mortellaro Specific Content For Mobile – Customize the mobile version without redirections allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Specific Content For Mobile – Customize the mobile version without redirections: from n/a through 0.1.9.5.
